price: 30. Halkaas, (Maalintaas) bay xaqiiqsan  naf walbaa waxay hor marsatay (khayr ama shar), waxaana loo celiyaa Mudanahooda Xaqa ah, wayna  ka tegi oo waayi waxay been abuurteen.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ تَبۡلُواْ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّآ أَسۡلَفَتۡۚ وَرُدُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَوۡلَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: hunālika tablū kullu nafsin mā aslafat waruddū ilā al-lahi mawlāhumu al-ḥaqi waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
